byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

abstract: Large rallies for Syria's Pres Bashar al-Assad show that his government still commands support from substantial part of population seven months after uprising against his rule began.
snippet: Rallies for Bashar al-Assad show that his government can still command support from a substantial part of the population in Syria, seven months after the uprising there started.

lead_paragraph: Rallies for Bashar al-Assad show that his government can still command support from a substantial part of the population in Syria, seven months after the uprising there started.

headline.main: Pro-Assad Rally Shows Syrian Government Can Still Command Support
headline.print_headline: Pro-Assad Rally Shows Syrian Government Can Still Command Support
headline.seo: Assad Supporters Hold Rally in Aleppo, Syria
